ComicInfo.Series: Dicks: To the End of Time, Like
ComicInfo.Summary:
GARTH ENNIS and JOHN MCCREA have saved the final over the top insult for last! If you thought Dougie and Ivor couldn't possibly screw up any more than they already have, you're in for a treat. Having wrecked the timeline and faced the horror of the Dong, the Dicks have one last chance to make it right before they destroy everything. Just us in celebrating the final adventure of the Dicks.
Available with Regular, Offensive, and Classic Moment Incentive covers by series artist John McCrea.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------------------|-------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | John McCrea | 1 | | Off | Offensive Cover | John McCrea | 2 | | CRI | Classic Moment Incentive Cover | John McCrea | 3 |
ComicInfo.Title: 6: All Dat Heavenly Glowy
